title: Vel Koz Bug
body: There has been a recent bug that I've found for  {{champion:161}}   that involves his auto attack animation.  {{champion:161}} 's left tentacle and upper tentacle will not do the hit animation, but the damage will still be dealt. Also, if {{champion:161}} auto attacks after using one of his abilities, he will freeze in....an odd position, but still able to move. This bug doesn't really affect the game, and it is quite funny to see that "odd position", but I just wanted to point this out. I'm not sure if this is all of the {{champion:161}} skins, but I noticed it when I played using the Arclight skin. So yeah.

replies.body:
Hey DexterousFlip,

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix!
Was Illaoi in the same game?
